<title>Take the Money and run! Trickledown Economics: From Hedge Funders to the London Riots </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CMRB;6f7f7b8d.1501</link>   <description> Centre of Media Studies, SOAS and CITY Journal present:<br><br>Take the Money and run! Trickledown Economics: From Hedge Funders to the London Riots<br><br>Saturday January 24th, 2015, 4:00 pm to 8:30 pm<br>Khalili Lecture Theatre, SOAS, Main Building, Russell Square<br><br>An evening exploring London\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds response to the crisis, with films, talks and debate<br><br>Event description:<br>The financial crisis following the banking collapse in 2008, has been a purely man-made phenomenon, an unsurprising result of the suicidal economics of short-term, casino economics of the international financial sector, and its capital, the City of London. The link between production and \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdwealth creation\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-02T08:48:07+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jamie Hakim</dc:creator>
